languages.text: {n}Махарий Зауэрбэк вскидывает голову. В его темных глазах — почти безумное пламя верности.{/n} "Почитание буквы закона — не есть верность правосудию. Отступание от тенет Лекса — не прозревание сути истины и дарования воздаяния". {n}Мужчина молчит несколько секунд, прежде чем почти что выкрикивает:{/n} "Род Зауэрбэк верен Вольному Торговцу!"
languages.translation_comment: Макарий Зауэрбэк — если жив и жена казнена и если Макарий жив

traits.locale_text: "Красиво стелешь, старуха, но мимо. Вольный Торговец — пронырлив{mf|ый|ая} мал{mf|ый|ая}, с котор{mf|ым|ой} приятно вести дела. И он{mf||а} бы точно не попал{mf|ся|ась} так глупо. Отзови-ка своих цепных псов, пока еще можешь..."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.translation_comment: Макарий Зауэрбэк — если жив и жена казнена и если Макарий жив

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий Зауэрбэк вскидывает голову. В его темных глазах — почти безумное пламя верности.{/n} "Почитание буквы закона — не есть верность правосудию. Отступание от тенет Лекса — не прозревание сути истины и дарования воздаяния". {n}Мужчина молчит несколько секунд, прежде чем почти что выкрикивает:{/n} "Род Зауэрбэк верен Вольному Торговцу!"

Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Lord Captain!"

Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: {n}Als Macharius Sauerback seinen Kopf hebt, erkennst du in seinen Augen eine nahezu wahnhafte Loyalität.{/n} "An den Buchstaben des Gesetzes zu kleben, heißt nicht, das Recht zu ehren. Wer von den Grundsätzen des Lex abweicht, unterscheidet nicht zwischen der Essenz der Wahrheit und der Ausübung von Vergeltung." {n}Der Mann schweigt einige Sekunden, ehe er lauthals verkündet:{/n} "Haus Sauerback ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Macharius Sauerback seinen Kopf hebt, erkennst du in seinen Augen eine nahezu wahnhafte Loyalität.{/n} "An den Buchstaben des Gesetzes zu kleben, heißt nicht, das Recht zu ehren. Wer von den Grundsätzen des Lex abweicht, unterscheidet nicht zwischen der Essenz der Wahrheit und der Ausübung von Vergeltung." {n}Der Mann schweigt einige Sekunden, ehe er lauthals verkündet:{/n} "Haus Sauerback ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben!"

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback lève la tête avec un regard brûlant d'une loyauté presque maladive.{/n} « Respecter la loi à la lettre n'est pas faire preuve de fidélité envers la justice. S'écarter des préceptes de la Lex ne mène pas à la recherche de la vérité objective ou au juste châtiment. {n}L'homme demeure silencieux quelques instants avant de s'écrier :{/n} La maison Sauerback est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback lève la tête avec un regard brûlant d'une loyauté presque maladive.{/n} « Respecter la loi à la lettre n'est pas faire preuve de fidélité envers la justice. S'écarter des préceptes de la Lex ne mène pas à la recherche de la vérité objective ou au juste châtiment. {n}L'homme demeure silencieux quelques instants avant de s'écrier :{/n} La maison Sauerback est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克抬起了头，目光中带着近乎疯狂的忠诚。{/n}“仅仅遵循法律条款，算不得是对正义的忠诚。若是有人偏离了帝国法典的本质，那便等同于对真理视而不见，理当受到惩罚。”{n}这个男人沉默了几秒钟，之后几乎是吼出了这句话。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族效忠于行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克抬起了头，目光中带着近乎疯狂的忠诚。{/n}“仅仅遵循法律条款，算不得是对正义的忠诚。若是有人偏离了帝国法典的本质，那便等同于对真理视而不见，理当受到惩罚。”{n}这个男人沉默了几秒钟，之后几乎是吼出了这句话。{/n}“苏尔贝克家族效忠于行商浪人！”

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback levanta la cabeza, y en sus ojos arde una lealtad casi demencial.{/n} «Venerar la ley escrita no es fidelidad a la justicia. Desviarse de los mandatos de la Lex es no comprender la esencia de la verdad y el castigo». {n}El hombre guarda silencio durante unos segundos antes de proclamar, casi a gritos:{/n} «¡La casa Sauerback es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback levanta la cabeza, y en sus ojos arde una lealtad casi demencial.{/n} «Venerar la ley escrita no es fidelidad a la justicia. Desviarse de los mandatos de la Lex es no comprender la esencia de la verdad y el castigo». {n}El hombre guarda silencio durante unos segundos antes de proclamar, casi a gritos:{/n} «¡La casa Sauerback es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックは頭を上げた。その目には狂気じみた忠誠心が燃えていた。{/n}「法の文言を崇拝することは、正義への忠誠ではない。レックスの教義から逸脱することは、真理の本質を見極め、報復を与えることではないのだ」{n}男は数秒沈黙した後、ほとんど叫ぶように言った。{/n}「ザウアーバック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓う！」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウス・ザウアーバックは頭を上げた。その目には狂気じみた忠誠心が燃えていた。{/n}「法の文言を崇拝することは、正義への忠誠ではない。レックスの教義から逸脱することは、真理の本質を見極め、報復を与えることではないのだ」{n}男は数秒沈黙した後、ほとんど叫ぶように言った。{/n}「ザウアーバック家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓う！」

languages.text: {n}Macharius Sauerback başını kaldırıyor. Gözlerinden dizginlenemez bir sadakat okunuyor.{/n} "Yasanın kelamına uyulunca adalet tecelli edecek diye bir kaide yoktur. Aksine intikam arzusuyla hakikati göz ardı etmek, Lex'in ilkelerine karşı gelmektir." {n}Birkaç saniye sustuktan sonra neredeyse bağırarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback raises his head, his eyes burning with an almost deranged loyalty.{/n} "Venerating the letter of the law is not fidelity to justice. Straying from the tenets of the Lex is not discerning the essence of truth and the granting of retribution." {n}The man is silent for a few seconds before he almost shouts out,{/n} "House Sauerback is loyal to the Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius Sauerback başını kaldırıyor. Gözlerinden dizginlenemez bir sadakat okunuyor.{/n} "Yasanın kelâmına uyulunca adalet tecelli edecek, diye bir kaide yoktur. Aksine; intikam arzusuyla hakikati gözardı etmek, Lex'in ilkelerine karşı gelmektir." {n}Birkaç saniye sustuktan sonra neredeyse bağırarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Sauerback Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır!"
